content: @Dan Gottlieb and I have content ready for technical correction to bulk data. These are corrections we voted on last winter, but haven't yet made a formal publication request. The diff is at https://github.com/HL7/bulk-data/compare/v1.0.0...tech-correct and the built version is at http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/bulk-data/branches/tech-correct/ .
